General.Name: Claranova SE
General.Description: Claranova SE, a technology company, engages in personalized e-commerce, software publishing, and internet of things businesses in the United States, the United Kingdom, Germany, France, other European countries, and internationally. It operates through three segments: PlanetArt, Avanquest, and myDevices. The PlanetArt segment offers photos, frames, personalized book, and FreePrints mobile apps. The Avanquest segment offers antivirus, ad blocker, cleaning, and optimization tools under the Adaware brand; document management tools under the SodaPDF brand; photo editor software, and apps developed under the inPixio brand. The myDevices segment offers IoT solutions. Claranova SE was incorporated in 1984 and is based in Courbevoie, France.
